alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Goochland; Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:33PM EDT until July 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL LOUISA...NORTHWESTERN GOOCHLAND AND EASTERN FLUVANNA COUNTIES... At 433 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ferncliff, or near Hadensville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Louisa, northwestern Goochland and eastern Fluvanna Counties, including the following locations... Bybee, Yanceyville, Louisa Airport, Byrd Mill, Stage Junction, Tabscott, Trevilians, Carysbrook, Wilmington and Caledonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
